greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of distinct even prime indices of n minus the number of distinct odd prime indices of n.
comment: A prime index of n is a number m such that prime(m) divides n. The multiset of prime indices of n is row n of A112798.
formula: G.f.: Sum_{k>=1} (-1)^k * x^prime(k) / (1 - x^prime(k)). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Feb 12 2020
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, May 17 2019
